articles.title: Hyundai Ioniq 9 2025 Review
articles.author: Wired
articles.summary: Hyundai's new flagship is refined enough to stand out. It shares the same underpinnings as the excellent EV9, but it's not the same as it was in the EV9. It's a stately new tech-laden flagship.

articles.title: Akeneo Brings the Voice of the Customer to Product Records, Preparing Companies for a New Era of AI-powered Commerce
articles.author: Akeneo
articles.summary: Akeneo is first-to-market with customer-informed product records to help businesses tailor product experiences to buyer intent. New in the Akeneo Product Cloud solution is the ability to leverage AI to bring the voice of the customer to the product record, paving the way for contextual product discovery and purchase.

articles.title: Exploring the Unattainable Super Slim iPhone 17 Air: Galaxy S25 Edge Rival in Focus
articles.author: archyde
articles.summary: Tecno Spark Slim is a 5.75mm thin concept phone with a 5,200 mAh battery. It has a 6.78-inch AMOLED display with 144Hz refresh rate and a resolution of 1224×2720 pixels. It is equipped with 8 GB of RAM, 128 GB of storage, and an octa-core CPU. The phone sports a dual-camera setup on the back, each boasting 50 MP, and a 13 MP front-facing camera. It's not in production yet, so it may not be available to consumers anytime soon.

articles.title: Guinness Ghana pledges to partner local creators, champion their skills in communities
articles.author: GNA
articles.summary: Guinness Ghana has reaffirmed its commitment to supporting local talents by partnering with creators across various industries to empower communities and promote economic growth. The event saw Ghanaian youths, social media personalities, influential individuals, artists and business owners gracing the occasion. The company plans to roll out a series of workshops, mentorship programmes and funding opportunities to help creators scale their businesses.

articles.title: Migo mobile sets out to bridge Nigerias digital gap
articles.author: Daily Trust
articles.summary: Migo Mobile has officially launched its operations in Nigeria. Its mission is to provide affordable, quality smartphones and laptops to Nigerians. According to George Evans, MD and CEO of MIGO Mobile, its focus is bridging the digital gap in the country.

articles.title: Shein's £30 gadget means you can wash AND dry your laundry WITHOUT a machine – it's perfect for all ‘lazy girl' cleaners
articles.author: Digital Writer
articles.summary: Shein's portable cleaner will wash and dry your laundry. It's small enough to be taken wherever you go and costs just £30. The device measures 32 x 32 x 33.5 cm and has a 15L capacity. It has three settings: quick wash, deep cleaning and rapid dehydration. It comes in two colours: grey and yellow.

articles.title: Shein's £30 gadget means you can wash AND dry your laundry WITHOUT a machine – it's perfect for all ‘lazy girl' cleaners
articles.author: Rhiannon Oliver
articles.summary: Shein's portable cleaner will wash and dry your laundry. It's small enough to be taken wherever you go and comes in two colours. The device measures 32 x 32 x 33.5 cm and has a 15L capacity. It has three settings: quick wash, deep cleaning and rapid dehydration. Shein sells its own products and acts as a marketplace for third-party sellers.

articles.title: Watch: BYD Partners With DJI, Unveils EV Model With Drone System On Top
articles.author: Shahrukh Shah
articles.summary: BYD has introduced an EV with a drone system on its top. The model is only available in the Chinese market and costs 1600 yuan (roughly 2,197 dollars). It is not yet confirmed when and at what time the vehicle will arrive in the other parts of the world.

articles.title: Amazon shoppers rush to buy £160 cordless vacuum cleaner that's 'better than a Dyson'
articles.author: Megan Archer-Fox
articles.summary: The Amazon product claims to lift dust, pet hair and stubborn dirt from carpets, hardwood floors and furniture surfaces. It offers a 60-minute runtime (in eco mode) on a single charge, requiring 4-5 hours to fully recharge. Some customers noted that the battery life was only 30 minutes on higher settings.

articles.title: Spanish brand La Antigua Lavandera enters the Romanian market
articles.author: Romania Journal
articles.summary: La Antigua Lavandera is a brand of BlueSun, a Spanish multinational company present in over 40 countries. La Antiguan Lavanderas comes to Romania with a full range of 22 products – laundry detergents, fabric softeners and household cleaning products. Lavander's product that has sold well on the Romanian market is the 2.5-liter laundry detergent for 50 washes. Lavandara's distributor in Romania, Nord Brand Masters, has placed Lavandar's products in the large Kaufland and Profi retailers network throughout the country.

articles.title: D-nee Welcomes Dan, Pattie, and Twins as Brand Ambassadors
articles.summary: Dan Worrawech Danuwong, Pattie Ungsumalynn Sirapatsakmetha, and their twins, Lycka and Rora, are the new brand ambassadors for D-nee, Thailand's No. 1 baby and kids' brand under Neo Corporate Public Company Limited. The official announcement took place at Fashion Hall, Siam Paragon, on 18 February 2025. The event also introduced the new organic detergent and fabric softener line, reaffirming the brand's industry leadership for an eighth consecutive year.

articles.author: Bhupendra Singh Chundawat
articles.summary: Maruti Suzuki has once again proven why it dominates the Indian automotive market with the launch of the new-generation Maruti Suzuki Ignisia.  Read more at: http://www.businessinsider.com/article/maruti-suzuki-launches-new-generation-minisia-ignisia,

articles.summary: On March 4, Nothing launched the Phone (3a) series in India. The company is entering the AI-powered smartphone market and aims to redefine user interaction. The Nothing Phone 3a features a 6.77-inch AMOLED display with a 120Hz adaptive refresh rate and 3,000-nit peak brightness. It supports 50W wired fast charging and 7.5W reverse wired charging.

articles.title: The Future Of Chatbots & AI-Powered Customer Support: 5 Game-Changing
articles.summary: Chatbots are transforming the way businesses engage with customers. AI-powered customer support is evolving at an unprecedented pace driven by advancements in machine learning, natural language processing (NLP), and automation. Businesses strive to improve efficiency and enhance user experiences with chatbots.

articles.title: ‘How?! Please tell me', mums beg as laundry whizz shows how to get grubby, white school socks pristine for just 15p
articles.author: Kate Kulniece
articles.summary: Stain Remover Soap costs £7.99 and is cruelty-free. Jemma Craig has used it to clean her white socks for the first time in a year and it worked. The product has an impressive five-star rating from satisfied customers.

articles.title: Dreamzy Serenity Sleep Aid – White Noise Machine with Nightlight & Rechargeable Battery, Portable for Adults & Babies
articles.summary: The Dreamzy Sunrise is an alarm clock designed to improve sleep quality and wake-up routine. It is equipped with advanced technology and light therapy to create a serene waking experience. It also includes a sleep mode that gradually dims the light to help users relax before bedtime. The sleek, modern design seamlessly integrates into any bedroom.

articles.title: Dyson Introduces New Supersonic r™ Hair Dryer Bringing Professional Hairstyling Home
articles.author: Kahekashan
articles.summary: The Dyson Supersonic r™ hair dryer is 30% smaller, 20% lighter and more manoeuvrable than the original. It has a new technology streamlined heater, the Dyson Hyperdymium™ motor, and intelligent Radio Frequency Identification (RFID) sensors in attachments. The machine has only been available for stylists to purchase so far, being unveiled at Fashion Week in the A/W24 season. Dyson will be partnering with Chloe show on 6 March, styling models backstage for the runway.

articles.title: Migo Mobile unveils plan to bridge digital gap
articles.author: Punch
articles.summary: Migo Mobile has officially launched its operations in Nigerias mobile device market. According to a statement, the company aims to bridge the country's digital gap and build a strong mobile phone network.    Click here to read the full news report.

articles.title: Google Play Store to make widgets more discoverable
articles.author: The Hindu Bureau
articles.summary: Google Play Store will be adding a new visual badge that indicates it has widgets. App listings will also have a separate search filter so users can directly look for apps that offer widgets. Google will also be rolling out an Editorial Page that highlights widgets that are designed well and showcases apps that come along with one.

articles.summary: Company A met at KINTEX in Goyang, Gyeonggi Province on the 2nd. Company A sells faucets called neonatal baby hypertrophy for 40,000 won per set. A similar product was being sold for several thousand won at AliExpress, a C-commerce company (Chinese Emerkers).

articles.title: Zixi to Showcase Live Video Workflow Innovations at NAB Show 2025
articles.author: Zixi
articles.summary: Zixi will be exhibiting at NAB Show 2025 in West Hall booth W1929. Zixi's solutions enable broadcast and live video workflow use cases for content owners, broadcasters, service providers, sports organizations, and OTT providers.

articles.title: Myntra Birthday Blast: Top 4 Body Mists
articles.author: Zee Media Bureau
articles.summary: The Myntra Birthday Blast Offer is now between March 1 and March 11, offering discounts on trendy body mists for ladies. Victoria's Secret Women Velvet Petals Fragrance Body Mist is ideal for those who are fond of a rich and feminine scent. DressBerry Ivory Body Mist has a gentle and romantic fragrance. Nike Women Original Body Mist leaves you feeling fresh throughout the day and keeps you guarded from sweat and body odor. DKNY's original body mist is fragrant to middle strength.

articles.title: Meghan Markle urged to follow five-step plan for As Ever brand after latest Netflix flop
articles.author: Sophia Papamavroudi
articles.summary: Meghan Markle launched her new lifestyle brand, As Ever, on Tuesday. It will sell spreads, pre-made baking mixes, herbal teas, French-style boxed crepe mix and shortbread cookie mix with flower mix. The prices have not been revealed, but shoppers are invited to subscribe to a mailing list to "save their seat at the table" and get updates and offers. Retail marketing expert Sarah Montano advises Meghan to follow a five-step plan for her brand to succeed.

articles.title: Google Pixel 10: Check expected launch date, new updates and other key details
articles.summary: Google is gearing up to launch its latest flagship smartphone, the Pixel 10, later this year. This device is expected to showcase significant advancements, including the introduction of the Pixel Sense AI assistant and the new Tensor 5 chip. The Google Pixel 10 series is expected in August 2025.

articles.title: Onyx steps in to help businesses that buy from Microsoft
articles.author: The Times/The Sunday Times
articles.summary: Two industry veterans Neil Lomax and Chris Brown have launched an AI-powered start-up that offers to help businesses find a good deal on their software and cloud services using their AI. It's aimed at businesses trying to work out if they are getting a good price on their products.

articles.title: When the weather gets nicer, we'll have a rare jacket for the transitional season
articles.author: TANYA GARCIA/WALLA
articles.summary: Parfois has launched a new jacket for late winter. Yves Saint Laurent's beauty division is launching a new liquid blush. Valentino's sunglasses are a timeless unisex model inspired by the elegance of classic Italian cinema. The new perfume by Burberry elevates the brand's classic perfume with fruity notes of wild strawberries and an orange blossom accord. Lacoste's new sneakers are available for NIS 669.

articles.title: Meghan Markle launches lifestyle brand hours after Netflix series airs
articles.author: Team Upday
articles.summary: The Duchess of Sussex has officially launched her lifestyle brand, called As Ever, just hours after her Netflix show With Love, Meghan premiered. The range includes spreads, pre-made baking mixes and limited edition wildflower honey with honeycomb and flower sprinkles. Shoppers are invited to subscribe to a mailing list to get updates and offers.

articles.title: Know When to Call in the Experts: Hiring a Digital Marketing Agency in New York
articles.summary: When is it the right time to hire a digital marketing agency in New York? Here are some clear signs that it might be the right move for your business today.   .      i   in the digital marketing industry, standing out requires a smart, strategic approach to digital marketing.

articles.title: MWC 2025: HONOR unveils new corporate strategy to transition to an AI device ecosystem company
articles.summary: MWC 2025: HONOR unveils new corporate strategy to transition to an AI device ecosystem company. CEO James Li calls on the industry to co-create an open, value-sharing ecosystem that maximizes human potential. The first step begins with the development of an intelligent phone embedded with human-centric AI.

articles.title: Coke says half time Pepsi says any time
articles.author: Wion Web Desk
articles.summary: Pepsi has launched its new 'Anytime is Pepsi Time' campaign. The campaign is all about making the most of every moment and living in the now. The ad is front page of one of the most popular English newspapers. The brand has always been about giving people more - more fizz and more excitement.

articles.title: Institute of Architects' gold medal awarded to two Wellington architects
articles.summary: Advertise with New ZealandME.com.uk. NZME.uk is a service of New Zealand Media Exchange.    New Media Exchange is a division of Media Exchange International, which offers services to the Media Exchange Marketer. New Media Marketer is based in New Zealand.

articles.title: Vax vacuum cleaner with almost 7k five-star reviews now 23% off in Amazon sale
articles.author: Rachael Davis
articles.summary: The Vax Mach Air Upright Vacuum Cleaner is available for £69 at Amazon, down from £89.99. It's been doing a great job for Amazon customers, with 4.3 out of 5 stars averaged across 10,415 ratings. The Shark Anti-Hair-Wrap Corded Stick Pet Vacuum is £162 direct from Shark.

articles.title: Spot cleaner that banishes spills and stains from carpets and upholstery is on sale
articles.author: Nisha Mal
articles.summary: Vax's best-selling spot cleaner is easy to assemble, has good cord length and is lightweight. Shark has knocked £50 off its Bissell carpet cleaner and it's good for small areas but not for the large ones. Vax is another well-regarded brand for carpet and spot cleaning.

articles.title: Delhaize Luxembourg Appoints Nicolas Gueuzurian As New Country Director
articles.summary: Nicolas Gueuzurian has been appointed as Delhaize Luxembourg's new country director, effective 1 April 2025. He will be tasked with driving the growth and development of the company within the Grand Duchy. His primary responsibility is to strengthen the brand's commitment to quality, innovation and customer satisfaction. The company has been present in Luxembourg for over 100 years and operates 63 stores.

articles.title: 8 new beauty buys to add to your vanity closet this March
articles.author: Sarah Joseph
articles.summary: Emirates Woman team shares their favourite beauty buys from their editor-approved list. From self-tanning oils to fast-absorbing body serums for hydrated skin, the latest beauty buys are endless. NARS Celestial Notes is an aromatic scent crafted to represent the aura of the adventurous zodiac sign.

articles.title: The Public Procurement Service announced on the 5th that it will hold the "2025 First Innovative Pro..
articles.author: Cho Han-Pil
articles.summary: The Public Procurement Service will hold the "2025 First Innovative Product Scouts Demo Day" at KINTEX from the 5th to the 6th of this month. It will be attended by 40 national evaluation teams, 12 experts, and 15 product scouts to select innovative products. 10 venture capitalists were invited to support investment attraction of innovative products and connect innovative companies and venture capital.

articles.title: Samsung Galaxy Book5 India launch soon! How to pre-reserve? Check offers details and other details
articles.author: Gargi Chaudhry
articles.summary: The latest Galaxy Book5 series laptops from Samsung are now available for pre-reservations in India. The new series includes a Dynamic AMOLED 2X display, Galaxy AI integration, and Intel's Lunar Lake CPUs. Samsung is expected to release further information about the availability and pricing when the offer expires on March 10.

articles.title: 'Miracle' patio cleaner makes gardens look 'like new' with 'no effort'
articles.author: Rachael Davis
articles.summary: The Pro-Kleen Ultimate Patio Cleaner is on sale on Amazon for £24.95 down from £29.95. The super-concentrated formula promises the five litres will go a long way, covering up to 25 square metres. It's safe for a range of stone types and pets and children.

articles.title: Leapmotor ‘jumps in' with a bold campaign via cummins&partners
articles.author: Alisha Buaya
articles.summary: Leapmotor has launched a new ad campaign, 'Jump In' with Cummins&Partners. The campaign has rolled out across multiple platforms, including TV, digital, social media, out-of-home, and experiential activations. It aims to establish Leapmotor as a leader in the EV space while differentiating it from the competition.

articles.title: 35 Underrated, Affordable Products That Will Make A Real Impact On Your Life
articles.author: Emma Lord
articles.summary: Ocusoft Lid Scrub Pads are great for dry, itchy, and irritated eyes. Dr. Scholl's Roll-On Foot Pain Relief Liquid is a fast-acting formula made with lidocaine and menthol to work within five minutes and tackle nerve pain for deep relief. ProKeeper's updated version of TikTok keeps your deli meat and cheese fresh and free from cuts.

articles.title: Atascosa County family keeping faith alive after fire destroys home
articles.summary: To stream KENS 5 on your phone, you need the KENS 5 app. It's free and available for Android and iOS devices. It is available on Google Play and Apple's Play Store. It costs about $0.99 per app.

articles.title: Amazon develops AI reasoning model: report
articles.author: Xinhua
articles.summary: Amazon is developing an AI model that incorporates advanced "reasoning" capabilities. The model may launch as soon as June under Amazon's Nova brand. Amazon aims to adopt a "hybrid" reasoning architecture for its new model to provide quick answers and more complex extended thinking within a single system.

articles.title: Best Dyson V15 Detect Absolute vacuum $550 off
articles.author: Ariana Pezeshki
articles.summary: The Dyson V15 Detect Absolute is on sale for $899. It's a powerful, intelligent cleaning machine that doesn't just suck up dust. It has a built-in LCD screen that shows the types and sizes of dust particles you're removing in real-time. It also comes with a Piezo sensor that automatically adjusts suction power when it detects higher amounts of dust, so you get extra grunt where you need it most.

articles.title: Firstbank holds Groundbreaking Ceremony for New state-of-the-art Eco-Friendly Headquaters
articles.author: Premium Times
articles.summary: FirstBank held a groundbreaking ceremony for new state-of-the-art Eco-Friendly Headquaters. FirstBank's commitment to excellence, innovation, and customer satisfaction was reaffirmed at the groundbreaking ceremony.   .

articles.title: OPPO Launches New Reno13 Series with Revolutionary AI Photography and Innovative Design
articles.author: Thisday
articles.summary: OPPO today launched its latest series of AI phones, the OPPO Reno13 Series, featuring the Reno13 5G, and Reno13 F 5G. The new phones bring flagship-like AI features and all-around performance to the market.

articles.title: 0101.Today launches ‘121 Comms' to streamline digital communication
articles.author: Bestmediainfo Bureau
articles.summary: 0101.Today has introduced '121 Comms,' an AI-powered tool designed to streamline digital communication. The solution enables the quick generation of brand-aligned content for email, WhatsApp, SMS, and RCS. The tool supports over 10 tonalities, from playful to professional, conversational to luxury. It is available instantly and completely free with no sign-ups.

articles.title: Opera Adds an Automated AI Agent To Its Browser
articles.author: Slashdot
articles.summary: Opera's browser now has a "agentic AI" that can perform a series of in-browser actions on the user's request. It can find 12 pairs of men's size 10 Nike socks and book flight tickets from Oslo to Newcastle. It runs at a more casual pace, so the user can take over at any point.

articles.title: Echoing Xbox and Steam, PlayStation rolls out a beta program where you sign up to "test participating games for the PS5 console and PC" plus new features
articles.author: Jordan Gerblick
articles.summary: Sony is launching an official PlayStation beta program to let players test new games and features before their official launch. It's similar to the Xbox Insider and Steam Insider beta programs. Sony has held various beta programs over the years but this new one is more like a hub where testers will be able to access all available betas in one place and choose which ones they want to participate in.

articles.title: CDN Technology is Driving Live Streaming Sales Channels in 2025
articles.author: Tech Moran
articles.summary: The rise of CDNs is changing the world of sales as we know it. CDNs are distributed servers that work in unison to deliver a live feed or stream to users irrespective of their geographical location. In the future, CDN technology is driving live streaming sales channels in 2025.

articles.title: For MSMEs, Chpter's API turns likes and comments into sales
articles.author: Techcabal
articles.summary: Startups like Chpter don't sell products directly. They provide the technology that allows other businesses to sell through platforms like WhatsApp and Instagram. Click here to read the full news article.      .  ...   "Chpter"

articles.title: Amazon is reportedly developing its own AI 'reasoning' model
articles.author: Techcrunch
articles.summary: According to Business Insider, Amazon is developing an AI model that incorporates advanced reasoning capabilities. The model may launch as soon as June under Amazons Nova brand, which the company introduced earlier this year. It is similar to models like OpenAIs o3-mini and Chinese AI lab DeepSeeks R1.

articles.title: 7 best smart fridges in Australia (from $1,249) - 2025 Guide
articles.author: Briannah Devlin
articles.summary: There are many smart fridges available on the market. New Idea recommends the best ones to buy. Samsung's Smart Fridge has a 386-litre fridge space, a 250-litres freezer and slide-in shelves. LG's fridge is slimly designed to fit in smaller spaces and look sleek. LG ThinQ has Wi-Fi connection for smart control.

articles.title: Sandsoft folds three more games into its hybrid-casual mobile roster
articles.author: Rachel Kaser
articles.summary: Wizario, Potions & Spells and Iza's Supermarket are new games from mobile gaming publisher Sandsoft Games. The games are developed by Latvian Kolka Games, Canadian Rogue Harbour Game Studio and Brazilian Izyplay Game Studio. Sandsoft plans to support more third-party developers to meet increasing demand.

articles.title: Dyson announces new hair dryer that is lighter and more powerful than the supersonic
articles.author: Daisy Lester
articles.summary: Dyson's new professional version of the supersonic r hair dryer will be released on 2 April. It's 20% smaller and 30% lighter than the original version and has a unique 'r' design. It was first unveiled in February 2024 at Paris Fashion Week.

articles.title: Dartmouth Woman Reunites with Her Past 20 Years Later at New Bedford Laundromat
articles.author: Gazelle Gazelle Published:
articles.summary: Brittany Brasells is a regular customer at Diamond Laundry in New Bedford, bringing her laundry every Monday morning. The owner of the laundromat found a newspaper with her photo on the front page from June 9, 2005. The front page featured a photo of her graduation ceremony from Greater New Bedford Voc-Tech. She is now the owner of Beauty by Britt in Dartmouth.

articles.title: Dyson V8 cordless stick vacuum is less than $300 at Target right now—but not for long
articles.author: Rachel Sandstrom Morrison
articles.summary: The Dyson V8 Origin cordless vacuum is less than $300 at Target right now. This is a savings of $130. It offers up to 40 minutes of run time and delivers the kind of cleaning power Dyson is known for. The deal is only available at Target for a limited time.

articles.title: Dyson Just Debuted Its Lightest, and Most Expensive, Styling Tool Yet
articles.author: Brooke Knappenberger
articles.summary: The Dyson Supersonic r is the first and only hair tool from the brand to bring salon-level styling to consumers at home. It's 20 percent lighter and 30 percent smaller than Dyson's other styling tools and has three precise airflow settings and four heat modes within a thumb's reach. It will be available exclusively on Dyson.com on March 6 and costs $570.

articles.title: The Dyson Supersonic R Is the Biggest Blow-Dryer Breakthrough in Years
articles.author: Marci Robin
articles.summary: The new Dyson Supersonic R hair dryer is 20% lighter, 30% smaller and weighs just 0.7 pounds. The new design started trickling into stylist hands at Fashion Week about a year ago, but a consumer version is just now becoming available to the masses with the same features as the professional edition.

articles.title: 2025 Audi A6 Avant revealed: Petrol and diesel wagon joins e-tron EV
articles.author: Jordan Mulach
articles.summary: The new Audi A6 Avant wagon has been unveiled with petrol and diesel engines under its bonnet. It has a choice of petrol or diesel engines. It's the new generation of Audi's A6 wagon. It will go on sale later this year.

articles.title: Cracking the code on egg labels
articles.summary: "Cage-free" and "farm fresh" are not the same thing as "cage free" or "farm-fresh" on your eggs labels. It's not always clear what these terms mean, though. It depends on the label you choose.

articles.title: Tesla To Hold New ‘Juniper' Model Y Handoff Event On March 8 As Deliveries Begin
articles.summary: Tesla is delivering the first 'Launch' edition Model Y to customers and will hold 'handoff' events at the Gigafactory in Austin, Texas and the Tesla plant in Fremont, California on March 8. Customers attending the event will be among the first customers to pick up the new Model Y. The price for the Launch Edition is $59,990 and $52,490 with the $7,500 federal tax credit. The Model Y was the best selling EV in the U.S. in 2024 with 372,613 units sold.

articles.title: Maximalist Design Dominates Fashion Week—Quiet Luxury Declared Dead
articles.author: Forbes
articles.summary: Consumers were introduced to a new era of design that emphasizes voluminous silhouettes, heavily structured foundations and comically influenced design details in the new generation of fashion design.      .   in this era of fashion is more about shape and form than about style.

articles.title: Combatting the $4.5 Trillion Counterfeit Luxury Goods Market with Advanced Authentication Methods
articles.author: Get News
articles.summary: Real Check is a product authentication service helping stop fraudulent luxury goods entering the market with new authentication tech. It is helping to prevent counterfeit luxury goods and other designer products from entering market. It's helping in an era where counterfeit luxury products are becoming more common.

articles.title: Google stuffs even more AI tools into online shopping
articles.author: Engadget
articles.summary: The shopping tools Google began rolling out on Wednesday might make it easier to find the clothing and makeup you'd have been looking for without the help of AI. Big Tech is investing a lot in AI-powered tools to assist you in spending your hard-earned cash.

articles.title: Xsolla Offerwall Boosts Game Monetization and Enhances Non-Paying Gamers' Engagement
articles.author: Antara News
articles.summary: Xsolla, a leading global video game commerce company, announces the launch of Xsolla Offerwall. It's a dynamic solution designed to enhance game monetization and player engagement. It will deliver revenue sharing opportunities and player experiences for Monetization and Advertising.

articles.author: Sheerluxe
articles.summary: Buttermilk yellow satin, metallic fringing and textured evening tops are a new brand from the new brand, Buttermilk Yellow Satin. It's available in black, white and yellow. It costs $99.99 for a pair of evening tops.

articles.title: Dreamzy Sunrise – Smart Alarm Clock with Gentle Wake-Up Light, Dual Alarms & Adjustable Brightness ...
articles.author: Belleview Reporter
articles.summary: Dreamzy Sunrise is an alarm clock designed to wake people up feeling refreshed and ready for the day ahead, rather than jolting them awake with loud, harsh sounds that leave them feeling groggy. It's aimed at people who struggle to get a restful night's sleep.

articles.title: Trojan launches ground-breaking Lithium OnePack Extended Range battery
articles.author: Golf Business News
articles.summary: Trojan Lithium OnePack Extended Range has been launched by the battery maker. It is available in black and white colours. It costs $99.99 for a pack of three.    for the pack of five. It has a range of up to 100 meters.

articles.title: This shaving brand was banned on TikTok, so it started an OnlyFans
articles.author: Fast Company
articles.summary: Nimbi, a razor brand launched at Erewhon in January 2024, is looking for a way to market their products online when the word 'razor' is shadowbanned. Nimbi started posting on TikTok last summer, but their views were low.

articles.title: There's a new way to play PlayStation and PC games early
articles.author: NME
articles.summary: Sony has unveiled a new way for PlayStation and PC users to play new or unreleased games early. The PlayStation Beta Program is a centralised place for you to register your interest in future PlayStation betas. It allows you to test participating PS5 and PC games, new PS5 console features and more.

articles.title: Google tests an AI-only version of its search engine
articles.author: RTE
articles.summary: Alphabet's Google launched an experimental version of its search engine today that completely eliminates its classic 10 blue links in favor of an AI-generated summary. The new feature is available to Google One AI Premium subscribers and can be accessed via the results page for any search query by clicking a tab.

articles.title: Tencent's AI chatbot overtakes DeepSeek to top China's free iOS apps
articles.summary: Tencent's AI chatbot Yuanbao overtook DeepSeek to become the most downloaded free iPhone app on Monday. ByteDance Doubao ranked fourth. Tencent applied for trademarks from 2020 to 2024 for "Tencent AI" and "WeChat AI".

articles.title: Tom Llamas to succeed Lester Holt as NBC "Nightly News" anchor
articles.author: DAVID BAUDER
articles.summary: Novo Nordisk cuts Wegovy prices following similar move by Zepbound-maker Eli Lilly. It follows similar moves by Eli Lilly and Novo Nordisk. It's effective from January 1st. It costs about $3.50 per litre.

articles.title: Officially ready for spring
articles.author: Joyce Steiner We Are Community
articles.summary: Julie Wise and she were hostesses for Circle on Wednesday evening. Circle is planning a chicken and noodle fundraising dinner for March 22. Circle has a new roof, a dry basement, a new furnace for the chapel, painting done and the building looks nice. The store has had many more customers since the weather has gotten better.
